transcript:
Customer: [inaudible] main itna nahi kar paungi mere paas 500 company hai sir main supply kar sakti hu.
Executive: Theek hai abhi main bolna phone lagana page kar dijiyega aaram se.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji. Hi, Abul Bahar ji se baat ho rahi hai?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Haan ji sir kal aapne sir IndiaMART ko not satisfied diya tha sir hamari team se aapse kal kisi se baat hui thi to unke baat karne pe aapne not satisfied diya tha main uske behalf pe call kar raha hu sir ki kya issue aa raha hai sir IndiaMART pe jo aapne not satisfied diya tha ki business nahi mil raha hai aapko?
Customer: Business nahi mil raha hai mere ko aur kya hai.
Executive: Haan ji sir.
Customer: Business nahi aa raha hai aur lag gaya tha usme.
Executive: [inaudible] khol ke dekhna hai.
Executive: Please sir Gulbahar sir ye kaun use kaun karta hai sir aapko to bylist aa rahi hai sir wooden serving tray mein aap deal karte ho right ye sab bylist aa rahi hai sir baat kyun nahi karte bylist se?
Customer: Baat karenge ji thoda kaam mein busy rahe.
Executive: Achha kaam mein busy hai?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: To kab se start karenge sir koi time bata do main apni team se bol dunga ki us time pe aap free hote to hum aapko dobara training de de sir guide bhi kar de ki kaise services use karni hai.
Customer: Bata dunga abhi thoda sa uljha hua hu main.
Executive: Theek hai aur baki sir aapne not satisfied diya hai matlab kisi aapke jo hamare executive hai sir usse to nahi dikkat hai na?
Customer: Nahi nahi koi dikkat nahi hai.
Executive: To sir ye main ticket close kar du na jo aapne hamare ticket diya not satisfied ka to aap abhi busy ho.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Theek hai main ye close kar deta hu fir bhi koi time bata do ki hum ek hafte baad ya 10 din baad aapko dobara connect kare aapko guide kare ki haan sir bylist aa rahi hai use karo aap.
Customer: Haan bylist to aati hai to koi mere matlab ki aayegi to main dekh lunga usko.
Executive: Aapki matlab ki aa rahi hai sir main ek request karunga Gulbahar sir aap IndiaMART ka app to aapke phone mein hai na sir?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Haan uske phone mein sir IndiaMART ka app open karenge na daily basis pe bylist aa raha hai aapka product batayenge sir ye wooden jharokha mein deal karna hai aapko?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Wooden jharokha theek hai isko aur kya bolte hai sir jharokha ko?
Customer: Bas jharokha hi hai ye.
Executive: Jharokha hi bolte hai sir agar main wooden jharokha ki baat karu sir to hamare paas bahut achha requirement aata hai sir is product ka. Saharanpur se to bahut sari company hai Royal furniture ka naam suna sir Royal furniture ka?
Customer: Achha.
Executive: Hello. Haan bataiye. Main keh raha hu sir Royal furniture and interior designing karke company hai jo jharokha banati hai. Theek hai ek aur company hai star furniture hub aapki Saharanpur se hi hai to ye company bahut achha business kar rahi hai sir IndiaMART se aapko bhi response milega but ek request hai Gulbahar sir IndiaMART ka app daily open karo sir aap app nahi open kar rahe hai. App open karenge to aapko bylist milengi sir ye jharokha ki.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai ye aapki aap hi use karne wale hai sir koi aur bhi hai?
Customer: Koi use to ladka karta hai wo thoda bahar gaya hua hai abhi.
Executive: Theek hai please sir main ye ticket close karunga to feedback jayega to please feedback yes kar dijiyega achha theek hai aapke mail pe jayega sir.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai main team se bolta hu aapko ek hafte baad dobara phone karegi please sir use kar lijiyega phone theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting enough business.

- Customer received a 'not satisfied' rating call.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the importance of using the app.

- Executive offered training on using IndiaMART services.

- Executive provided examples of successful companies.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will close the ticket.

- Team will call the customer after a week.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, app usage, training, not satisfied
